comment:
* Represents a PixelCopy request.
     *
     * To create a copy request, use either of the PixelCopy.Request.ofWindow or
     * PixelCopy.Request.ofSurface factories to create a {@link Request.Builder} for the
     * given source content. After setting any optional parameters, such as
     * {@link Builder#setSourceRect(Rect)}, build the request with {@link Builder#build()} and
     * then execute it with {@link PixelCopy#request(Request, Executor, Consumer)}

methods.name: public Bitmap getDestinationBitmap()
methods.comment: * @return The destination bitmap as set by {@link Builder#setDestinationBitmap(Bitmap)}

methods.name: public Rect getSourceRect()
methods.comment: * @return The source rect to copy from as set by {@link Builder#setSourceRect(Rect)}

methods.name: public void request(@NonNull Executor callbackExecutor, @NonNull Consumer<Result> listener)

methodNames: public void request(@NonNull Executor callbackExecutor, @NonNull Consumer<Result> listener)
